resources.string: All Apps will be suspended and the screen will turn off.
The app is not registered as a device admin. The running apps will still be killed, but the screen will not turn off.
Cool It can now switch off the screen. This helps to cool down your device.
If you disable the admin rights Cool It can no longer switch off the screen. The running apps will still be killed.
The app is no longer a device admin. The running apps will still be killed, but the screen will not turn off.

Blue button kills all running apps and switch off the screen now.

Activation temperature is the point at which this process is started automatically. 

To activate the automatic process press the green button. 

To stop the automatic process press the red button.
